name: Robot Designer (SuperHyperHedgey)
description:
This was made for the PigSquad June 2022 Gamejam.

Character Creator Bullethell, where you add cosmetics and accessories to your robot by collecting the collectibles on screen. 

Arrow Keys to move

Avoid the gears otherwise, you'll lose all your accesories.

Survive for 30 seconds and then you win.
